title: 2 Bed/1 Bath Condo for rent
posting_body: Please note: Some or all pictures in the listing may be old.
***Weekly Open House appointment slots available for Saturday and Sunday's to view the unit***
We have a 2BR/1BA clean and nice upstairs condo available for rent near in a quiet neighborhood in coyote creek, is on Warfield way, (across Tully and Galveston ave.)
Then rent includes water and garbage!!!
Nice Kitchen good condition appliance and nice cabinet.
-	Refrigerator
-	Dishwasher
-	Hardwood floor
-	Walk in closets
-	Central AC
-	Washer and dryer outlet’s inside the unit
-	One car garage, 1 additional parking on carport with permit and plenty parking on the street.
-       Includes amenities like communal swimming pool and park
-	Fairly close to 101 freeway
-	Ten minutes from San Jose State University, Evergreen Community College, Kelley Park, Happy Hollow Park and Zoo, Costco, Eastridge Mall and plenty of restaurants around.
We are looking for clean and professional people with stable job and are free of drugs.
Lease term for one year.
Security deposit $2350, $30 credit check
The condo will be available starting Aug 5, 2022.
Serious applicant(s) would need to prepare:
1) Last two pay check stubs
2) Last two month bank statement
No smokers and no pets.
If interested, please email me with a brief description of yourself including your full name, what you do for living and number of people living at the property.
